description: Apoio às Políticas Públicas de Desenvolvimento Sustentável

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: The Project "Support Public Policies for Sustainable Development", BRA/00/022 aims to participate in the efforts of the Ministry of Environment to prepare instruments for environmental management and sustainable rural development for the benefit of the environmental and life quality in Brazil.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA00022 Sustainable Develop.
